title: Industrial Metal and a Stack of Slim Shady: The Tadej Pogačar Spotify Playlist is … Interesting
content:
Wondered what Pogačar was vibing to while he dominated the 2024 season? Eminem, Rammstein, and some obscure Slovenian stuff, that's what.

Read the full article at Industrial Metal and a Stack of Slim Shady: The Tadej Pogačar Spotify Playlist is … Interesting on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
